subject: New control box
description_text:
I ordered some pedals on December 9 of last year off your Amazon store and I was wondering if I could get the new control box. I just placed another order today and attached a note but I don’t know if it went through. thank you 

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi blake pursley,    Could you please provide your order number? I’ll help you check the details.

https://www.amazon.com/gp/css/summary/print.html?orderID=111-3573181-7663400&ref_=ppx_hzod_invoiceConns_mob_b_invoice 
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Order #111-3573181-7663400

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

I mean can I buy one or what?? I mean hell they can’t be shit? The ones you guys have sent me I can  make for 2 bucks.. I just want to be able to use the software fr my pedals come on 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi blake pursley,  Our Amazon sales team should have already replied to you. If needed, you can simply purchase a PlusX control box separately — there's no need to buy a whole new pedal set.

Yes they did I bought it off Amazon I appreciate the help.. thank you 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
